mapper.select: select * from comments where content_id = #{content_id} order by re_comment_id asc, comment_id asc
mapper.insert: insert into comments (content_id, user_id, target_id, comment_val) values (#{content_id},#{user_id}, #{target_id}, #{comment_val})
mapper.update: update comments set re_comment_id = (select * from (select max(comment_id) from comments where user_id = #{user_id}) as t) where comment_id = (select * from (select max(comment_id) from comments where user_id = #{user_id}) as x);
mapper.insert: insert into comments (re_comment_id, content_id, user_id, target_id, comment_val) values (#{comment_id}, #{content_id}, #{user_id}, #{target_id}, #{comment_val})
mapper.update: update comments set target_id = #{target_id}, comment_val = #{comment_val} where re_comment_id = #{re_comment_id} and content_id= #{content_id} and user_id = #{user_id} and comment_id = #{comment_id}
mapper.delete: delete from comments where comment_id = #{comment_id} or re_comment_id = #{comment_id}
